INSERT INTO COMMENTS_HISTORY_READ( COMM_ID , REFERENCE_ID , REFERENCE_DIV , READ_YN , CREATOR , CREATED_DATE ) SELECT T1.COMM_ID ,T1.REFERENCE_ID ,T1.REFERENCE_DIV ,'Y' ,#{loginUserName} ,now() FROM COMMENTS_HISTORY T1 WHERE T1.USE_YN = 'Y' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM COMMENTS_HISTORY_READ T2 WHERE T1.comm_id = T2.comm_id AND T1.reference_id = T2.reference_id AND T1.reference_div = T2.reference_div AND T2.creator = #{loginUserName} ) AND T1.REFERENCE_DIV IN ('19', '10', '12', '14', '20') AND T1.CREATOR <> #{loginUserName} AND T1.CREATED_DATE >= DATE_FORMAT(date_add(now(), interval -7 day), '%Y%m%d') AND T1.CREATED_DATE <= now() AND T1.CONTENTS IS NOT NULL AND T1.CONTENTS <> ''
AND ( ( T1.REFERENCE_ID IN ( SELECT A1.PRJ_ID FROM PROJECT_MASTER A1 WHERE A1.USE_YN = 'Y' AND ( A1.CREATOR = #{loginUserName} OR EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM PROJECT_WATCHER A1
WHERE A1.PRJ_ID = T1.REFERENCE_ID AND (A1.USER_ID = #{loginUserName} OR (A1.USER_ID = 'all' AND A1.DIVISION = (SELECT DIVISION FROM T2_USERS A2 WHERE A2.USER_ID = #{loginUserName}) )) ) ) ) ) OR ( T1.REFERENCE_ID IN ( SELECT A1.PARTNER_ID FROM PARTNER_MASTER A1 WHERE A1.USE_YN = 'Y' AND ( A1.CREATOR = #{loginUserName} OR EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM PARTNER_WATCHER A1
WHERE A1.PARTNER_ID = T1.REFERENCE_ID AND (A1.USER_ID = #{loginUserName} OR (A1.USER_ID = 'all' AND A1.DIVISION = (SELECT DIVISION FROM T2_USERS A2 WHERE A2.USER_ID = #{loginUserName}) )) ) ) ) ) )
AND ( ( T1.REFERENCE_ID IN ( SELECT A1.PRJ_ID FROM PROJECT_MASTER A1 WHERE A1.USE_YN = 'Y' AND (A1.REVIEWER = #{loginUserName} OR IFNULL(A1.REVIEWER, '') = '')) ) OR ( T1.REFERENCE_ID IN ( SELECT A1.PARTNER_ID FROM PARTNER_MASTER A1 WHERE A1.USE_YN = 'Y' AND (A1.REVIEWER = #{loginUserName} OR IFNULL(A1.REVIEWER, '') = '')) ) )

SELECT CVE_ID , VULN_SUMMARY , PUBL_DATE , BASE_METRIC , CVSS_SCORE , CASE WHEN CVSS_SCORE >= 9.0 THEN 'Critical' WHEN CVSS_SCORE >= 7.0 THEN 'High' WHEN CVSS_SCORE >= 4.0 THEN 'Medium' ELSE 'Low' END CRITICAL_SCORE FROM NVD_CVE_V3 ORDER BY REG_DATE DESC LIMIT 20

SELECT TODAY.* FROM ( SELECT ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM NVD_CVE_V3 WHERE DATE_FORMAT(REG_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') ) AS NEW_CNT ,( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM NVD_DATA_SCORE_V3 NVD WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM NVD_CVE_V3 WHERE DATE_FORMAT(REG_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') AND CVE_ID = NVD.CVE_ID ) ) AS NEW_MAT_CNT ,( SELECT COUNT(1) AS MAT_OSS_CNT FROM OSS_VERSION OM WHERE OM.VULN_YN = 'Y' AND DATE_FORMAT(OM.VULN_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') ) AS OM_M_CNT ) TODAY
UNION ALL
SELECT THIS_WEEK.* FROM ( SELECT ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM NVD_CVE_V3 WHERE DATE_FORMAT(REG_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL - 1 WEEK), '%Y-%m-%d') ) AS NEW_CNT ,( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM NVD_DATA_SCORE_V3 NVD WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM NVD_CVE_V3 WHERE DATE_FORMAT(REG_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL - 1 WEEK), '%Y-%m-%d') AND CVE_ID = NVD.CVE_ID ) ) AS NEW_MAT_CNT ,( SELECT COUNT(1) AS MAT_OSS_CNT FROM OSS_VERSION OM WHERE OM.VULN_YN = 'Y' AND DATE_FORMAT(OM.VULN_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL - 1 WEEK), '%Y-%m-%d') ) AS OM_M_CNT ) THIS_WEEK
UNION ALL
SELECT THIS_MONTH.* FROM ( SELECT ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM NVD_CVE_V3 WHERE DATE_FORMAT(REG_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL - 1 MONTH), '%Y-%m-%d') ) AS NEW_CNT ,( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM NVD_DATA_SCORE_V3 NVD WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM NVD_CVE_V3 WHERE DATE_FORMAT(REG_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL - 1 MONTH), '%Y-%m-%d') AND CVE_ID = NVD.CVE_ID ) ) AS NEW_MAT_CNT ,( SELECT COUNT(1) AS MAT_OSS_CNT FROM OSS_VERSION OM WHERE OM.VULN_YN = 'Y' AND DATE_FORMAT(OM.VULN_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL - 1 MONTH), '%Y-%m-%d') ) AS OM_M_CNT ) THIS_MONTH
UNION ALL
SELECT LAST_MONTH.* FROM ( SELECT ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM NVD_CVE_V3 WHERE DATE_FORMAT(REG_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL - 2 MONTH), '%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL - 1 MONTH), '%Y-%m-%d') ) AS NEW_CNT ,( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM NVD_DATA_SCORE_V3 NVD WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM NVD_CVE_V3 WHERE DATE_FORMAT(REG_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL - 2 MONTH), '%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL - 1 MONTH), '%Y-%m-%d') AND CVE_ID = NVD.CVE_ID ) ) AS NEW_MAT_CNT ,( SELECT COUNT(1) AS MAT_OSS_CNT FROM OSS_VERSION OM WHERE OM.VULN_YN = 'Y' AND DATE_FORMAT(OM.VULN_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL - 2 MONTH), '%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL - 1 MONTH), '%Y-%m-%d') ) AS OM_M_CNT ) LAST_MONTH
UNION ALL
SELECT THIS_YEAR.* FROM ( SELECT ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM NVD_CVE_V3 WHERE DATE_FORMAT(REG_DATE, '%Y') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y') ) AS NEW_CNT ,( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM NVD_DATA_SCORE_V3 NVD WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM NVD_CVE_V3 WHERE DATE_FORMAT(REG_DATE, '%Y') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y') AND CVE_ID = NVD.CVE_ID ) ) AS NEW_MAT_CNT ,( SELECT COUNT(1) AS MAT_OSS_CNT FROM OSS_VERSION OM WHERE OM.VULN_YN = 'Y' AND DATE_FORMAT(OM.VULN_DATE, '%Y') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y') ) AS OM_M_CNT ) THIS_YEAR
